translated: the suchness of volitional factors,🔽and the suchness of consciousness.🔽The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is the suchness of the eyes.🔽The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is the suchness of the ears,🔽the suchness of the nose,🔽the suchness of the tongue,

original: 'jig pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'jig pa mi dmigs /
translated: the suchness of the body,🔽and the suchness of the mental faculty.🔽The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is the suchness of sights.🔽The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is the suchness of sounds,🔽the suchness of odors,🔽the suchness of tastes,🔽the suchness of tangibles,🔽and the suchness of mental phenomena.🔽The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is the suchness of the sensory element of the eyes.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

original: 'jig pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'jig pa mi dmigs /

translated: The branches of enlightenment are neither endowed with the transcendent perfection of wisdom nor are they not endowed with it.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The noble eightfold path is neither endowed with the transcendent perfection of wisdom nor is it not endowed with it.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽bsam gtan rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // bsam gtan rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The noble truths are neither endowed with the transcendent perfection of wisdom nor are they not endowed with it.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽tshad med pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // tshad med pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The meditative stabilities are neither endowed with the transcendent perfection of wisdom nor are they not endowed with it.

original: mi ldan @107a *//🔽pa'ang ma yin no //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan @107a *// pa'ang ma yin no // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The immeasurable aspirations are neither endowed with the transcendent perfection of wisdom nor are they not endowed with it.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: The formless absorptions are neither endowed with the transcendent perfection of wisdom nor are they not endowed with it.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the eight liberations;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the nine serial steps of meditative absorption;

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // mngon par shes pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, or the wishless meditative stabilization;🔽they are not associated with or disassociated from the five eyes;🔽they are not associated with or disassociated from the six superknowledges;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the four detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽they are not associated with or disassociated from the four fearlessnesses;

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the four detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽they are not associated with or disassociated from the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: they are not associated with or disassociated from the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no; ;byams pa chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no; ;byams pa chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with great love,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: snying rje chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with great compassion,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with the fruit of entering the stream,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.🔽He is not associated with the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang @107b ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang @107b ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // dgra bcom pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor is he non-associated.🔽He is not associated with arhatship,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: rang byang chub ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rang byang chub ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with individual enlightenment,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ldan la'ang ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ldan la'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with the knowledge of path aspects,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he non-associated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽'dus byas kyi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // 'dus byas kyi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is neither associated nor non-associated with the knowledge of paths.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽'dus ma byas kyi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // 'dus ma byas kyi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The conditioned element is neither associated nor non-associated with the unconditioned element.🔽The unconditioned element is neither associated nor non-associated with the conditioned element.🔽The conditioned element is neither associated nor non-associated with the unconditioned element.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because there is no such entity.🔽That which is no entity

original: gang ldan pa'ang mi ldan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: gang ldan pa'ang mi ldan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: is not an entity.

original: gang ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /🔽dngos po med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pa ni /🔽dngos po med pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gang ngo bo nyid med pa de ni / dngos po med pa'o // dngos po med pa ni / dngos po med pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: That which is not an entity

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: is neither associated nor non-associated with an entity.

original: de ltar chos thams cad shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus should all dharmas be known.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti,🔽this is the summary of

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdor bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdor bsdus pa ste /
translated: the perfection of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: mdor bsdus pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //
translated: The beginner bodhisattva great beings should train in this perfection, in this summary.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la gnas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la gnas te /
translated: and who abide in the ten bodhisattva stages,

original: mdor bsdus pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: should train in this brief instruction.

original: mdor bsdus pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /🔽chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas @108a *//
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas @108a *//
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains in this brief instruction🔽will know the concise and extensive

original: pa shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: of all dharmas.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnon pos rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnon pos rtogs pa'o //
translated: this is the realization of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas with sharp faculties.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po zhan pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po zhan pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: this is the realization of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas with weak faculties.

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po 'bring pos kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po 'bring pos kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the realization of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas with middling faculties.

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po mnyam par bzhag pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po mnyam par bzhag pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: This is the realization of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas with faculties in equipoise.

original: 'di ni / slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'di ni / slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to train and who will not understand it.

original: 'di ni / le lo can gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /🔽brtson 'grus zhan pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni / le lo can gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin / brtson 'grus zhan pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /
translated: It is not understood by the lazy.🔽It is not understood by those with weak perseverance.

original: dran pa nyams pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nyams pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /
translated: It is not understood by those with impaired mindfulness.

original: sems 'khrugs pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sems 'khrugs pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not understood by those with disturbed minds.

original: 'di ni / brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
analyzed: 'di ni / brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
translated: It is understood by those who have begun to persevere,

original: le lo med pa /
analyzed: le lo med pa /
translated: who are not lazy,

original: dran pa nye bar gnas pas rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gnas pas rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: and who have established mindfulness.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa /
translated: Those who wish to train in the irreversible levels

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas rtogs par 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas rtogs par 'gyur pa ste /
translated: and who wish to attain omniscience will understand it.

original: gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing /
analyzed: gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing /
translated: If they train in the perfection of wisdom as it has been taught,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @108b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @108b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative stabilization,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed na /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom, then they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdud kyi las ci byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdud kyi las ci byung yang rung ste /
translated: When those bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, whatever deeds of Māra occur,

original: de dag thams cad 'byung ba nyid kyi tshe rab tu spangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'byung ba nyid kyi tshe rab tu spangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: all of them will be completely abandoned as soon as they arise.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings who wish to be sustained by skillful means should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang
translated: When a bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom,🔽meditates on the perfection of wisdom, and strives in the perfection of wisdom, then the blessed buddhas, as many as there are, in countless world systems, who are present, live, and teach the Dharma,

original: / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: will pay attention to that bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las byung ba ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las byung ba ni /
translated: It is like this:🔽The blessed buddhas of the past, future, and present

original: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te /
translated: have arisen from these six perfections.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems @109a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems @109a *//
translated: the bodhisattva great beings

original: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: The great hero who practices the perfection of wisdom should investigate as follows:

original: chos gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis brnyes par gyur pa dang / brnyes pa dang / brnyes par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag gis kyang thob par bya'o /
analyzed: chos gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis brnyes par gyur pa dang / brnyes pa dang / brnyes par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag gis kyang thob par bya'o /
translated: “I too should attain those dharmas that the past, future, and present Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, have attained, are attaining, and will attain.”

original: snyam du brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: snyam du brtag par bya ste /
translated: He should investigate in this way.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de ltar brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de ltar brtson par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being should make an effort in this way while practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great being who makes an effort in this way

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya ste /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings should not be separated from keeping in mind the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du de ltar spyod na; chung ngu na sa gol gtogs pa tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du de ltar spyod na; chung ngu na sa gol gtogs pa tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
translated: If bodhisattva great beings practice like that for the sake of the knowledge of all aspects, then even if they meditate on the perfection of wisdom for as little as a finger snap,

original: de'i bsod nams ni /
analyzed: de'i bsod nams ni /
translated: their merit🔽would be much greater than the merit from satisfying with gifts and establishing in morality, concentration,

original: ches mang du 'phel gyi; stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byas pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa @109b dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang /
analyzed: ches mang du 'phel gyi; stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byas pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa @109b dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang /
translated: and wisdom all the sentient beings that there are in a great trichiliocosm world system.

original: shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /
translated: nor in the knowledge of liberation, nor in the result of stream enterer, nor in the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni ma yin te /🔽gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di se gol gtogs pa tsam du bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni ma yin te / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di se gol gtogs pa tsam du bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni /
translated: nor in the result of non-returner, nor in the state of a worthy one, nor in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: The merit of those who meditate on this deep perfection of wisdom for just the time it takes to snap one’s fingers is much greater.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na //
translated: Why is that?

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni /
translated: once-returner,🔽nonreturner,🔽and arhatship;

original: 'di las byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ste /
translated: and the solitary realizers’ enlightenment.🔽The blessed buddhas, however many there are, who dwell,🔽are present, and live in the world systems of the ten directions,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ngo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ngo //
translated: and who teach the Dharma, have all emerged from this perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The blessed buddhas of the past,

original: gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ngo //
analyzed: gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ngo //
translated: present, and future have all emerged from this perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gang skad 'ga' @110a *//🔽'am; nyin 'ga' 'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gang skad 'ga' @110a *// 'am; nyin 'ga' 'am /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, if someone were to practice this perfection of wisdom for one day,🔽one month,🔽one year,🔽or one hundred years,

original: nyi ma brgya'am /
analyzed: nyi ma brgya'am /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, if someone were to practice this perfection of wisdom for a day, or a fortnight,

original: lo 'ga' 'am /
analyzed: lo 'ga' 'am /
translated: or a month,🔽or a hundred days,

original: lo brgya'am / bskal pa 'ga' 'am /
analyzed: lo brgya'am / bskal pa 'ga' 'am /
translated: or a year,

original: bskal pa brgya nas bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i yid la bya bas bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni /
analyzed: bskal pa brgya nas bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i yid la bya bas bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni /
translated: or a hundred years, or a hundred eons, up to a hundred eons beyond count, with attention focused on the knowledge of all aspects,

original: ches mang du 'phel gyi /
analyzed: ches mang du 'phel gyi /
translated: their merit would increase much more than that.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: If all the sentient beings in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River

original: sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang / shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang /
analyzed: sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang / shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang /
translated: were established in generosity, established in discipline, established in concentration, established in wisdom,

original: rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /
translated: nor by establishing them in the result of being tied to one more rebirth,🔽nor by establishing them in the result of no longer being subject to rebirth,🔽nor by establishing them in arhatship,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni /🔽ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni / ma yin no //
translated: nor by establishing them in individual enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?🔽It is because they have taught the bases of meritorious action that arise from giving,🔽they have taught the bases of meritorious action that arise from morality,🔽they have taught the bases of meritorious action that arise from meditation,

original: gang gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang /
analyzed: gang gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang /
translated: they have taught the result of stream enterer,

original: @110b lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bstan pa dang / rang byang chub bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'di las byung ngo //
analyzed: @110b lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bstan pa dang / rang byang chub bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'di las byung ngo //
translated: The result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening have all come from this perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de ni /

analyzed: phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the formless absorptions.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the liberations.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the serial absorptions.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the superknowledges.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the ten tathāgata powers.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the four fearlessnesses.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of giving.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of morality.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of patience.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of perseverance.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of concentration.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of wisdom.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of skill in means.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of aspiration.

original: byang @111b byang  chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang @111b byang  chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of power.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the perfection of knowledge.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsgoms par rig par bya'o //

translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known to have cultivated the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /

translated: One should know that these are the advantages for the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom, who actualizes the perfection of wisdom, and who cultivates the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya re gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya re gcig pa //
translated: Volume 217🔽Subhūti said:

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi /
translated: how should one practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should one actualize the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one cultivate the perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs rag las pa dang / gzugs gsog dang / gzugs snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs rag las pa dang / gzugs gsog dang / gzugs snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: “One should practice the perfection of wisdom because form is peaceful, because form is dependent, because form is empty, and because form is insubstantial.

original: tshor ba zhi ba dang / tshor ba rag las pa dang / tshor ba gsog dang / tshor ba snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba zhi ba dang / tshor ba rag las pa dang / tshor ba gsog dang / tshor ba snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: “One should practice the perfection of wisdom because of the peacefulness of feeling, because of the dependence of feeling, because of the emptiness of feeling, and because of the essencelessness of feeling.

original: 'du shes zhi ba dang / 'du shes rag las pa dang / 'du shes gsog dang / 'du shes snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes zhi ba dang / 'du shes rag las pa dang / 'du shes gsog dang / 'du shes snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: “One should practice the perfection of wisdom because of the peacefulness of perception, because of the dependence of perception, because of the emptiness of perception, and because of the essencelessness of perception.
